name: call-management-system
description: A comprehensive call management application with AWS serverless backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dynamodb:setup: cd backend && npm run dynamodb:install && npm run dynamodb:create-tables && npm run client:create-tables && npm run dynamodb:seed && npm run client:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
